## **R**

### Packages

[**crhomHMMviewR**](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/chromHMMviewR): ggplot2-based functions that draw heatmaps from ChromHMM output data.


### Shiny apps

[**DPomics**](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DPomics): shiny app designed to visualize omics data from the Pasini Lab (RNA-seq and ChIP-seq). *ongoing*

[**DNAme**](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DNAme): shiny app designed for learning purposes that converts a word to a DNA sequence.

[**DNAapp**](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/DNApp): simple shiny app with several DNA-related tools.


### Miscellaneous

[**Custom R functions**](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/custom-R-functions): simple R functions to solve diverse problems I am finding every day.
